promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young strong chameleon electric-type wearing a dark mask. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or electric. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltchow, a chibi young strong chameleon electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: thunder-shock, double-edge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word chameleon or electric or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, chameleon-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Voltchow loves city life! It hides in urban areas, shocking anyone that gets too close with its powerful double-edge blasts!
